content: --- title: Electronic Flight Bag Data Models description: published: true date: 2025-09-19T15:58:51.661Z tags: editor: markdown dateCreated: 2025-07-25T08:10:46.613Z --- # Flight Bag Plan Info Data Model | Attribute | Type | Description | | :---------------- | :--------: | :----------------------------------------------------------| | flightId | `'string'` | Flight identifier. A flight may include multiple flight leg due to operational reasons. | | sectorId | `'string'` | EFB flight sector identifier | | efbCaptainUsername | `'string'` |Username of the captain who downloaded or accepted the flight plan on the EFB | | eventType | `'string'` | Type of the event | | cycleId | `'string'` | Flight cycle identifier (EFB flight cycle id) | eventDate | `'datetime'` | Timestamp of when the event occurred in UTC (e.g., when the plan was downloaded on the EFB) | | eventProcessedDate | `'datetime'` | When the event was processed in UTC | ofpNumber | `'string'` | Operation flight plan number | | extraInfo | `'string'` | Extra information | # Flight Bag Fuel Data Model | Attribute | Type | Description | | :---------------- | :--------: | :----------------------------------------------------------| | flightId | `'string'` | Flight identifier. A flight may include multiple flight leg due to operational reasons. | | sectorId | `'string'` | EFB flight sector identifier | | efbCaptainUsername | `'string'` |Username of the captain who downloaded or accepted the flight plan on the EFB | | eventType | `'string'` | Type of the event | | cycleId | `'string'` | Flight cycle identifier (EFB flight cycle id) | eventDate | `'datetime'` | Timestamp of when the event occurred in UTC (e.g., when the plan was downloaded on the EFB) | | eventProcessedDate | `'datetime'` | When the event was processed in UTC | ofpNumber | `'string'` | Operational flight plan number | | amountOfFuel | `'number'` | Amount of the requested fuel. | reasonOfFuelOrder| `'string'` | Reason for fuel request. | | unitOfFuel
